issue.title: [C++] Remove GlobalForkSafeMutex
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we have a proper at-fork facility, the `GlobalForkSafeMutex` has probably become pointless and therefore can be removed.
